get.summary: Returns metadata for up to 1000 of your account's most recent recordings (optionally filterable)
get.description: Returns a list of metadata for the recordings associated with the specified account. The list can be filtered by the optional from, to, minStartTime, and maxStartTime arguments. The list is capped at 1000 entries and may be empty if no recordings match the specified criteria.
